title: "I Am Evil": Lucy Letby's Confession Notes Were Written As Part Of Therapy

title: Shooting At High School In US's Georgia, Casualties Feared, Suspect Held
content: A high school in US's Georgia is in the midst of an active shooting incident. Police and medics have been rushed to the school and the neighbourhood has been put under a lockdown.
summary: A high school in US's Georgia is in the midst of an active shooting incident. Police and medics have been rushed to the school and the neighbourhood has been put under a lockdown.

title: Deadly Mpox Outbreak Strikes US Prison, Infecting Multiple Inmates
content: The virus, which spreads primarily through close physical contact, has now been detected in an Iowa prison, raising concerns about containment within high-risk environments.
summary: The virus, which spreads primarily through close physical contact, has now been detected in an Iowa prison, raising concerns about containment within high-risk environments.

title: US To Accuse Russia Of Effort To Influence 2024 Election: Report
content: The United States plans to accuse Russia on Wednesday of a campaign to influence the 2024 elections using online platforms to target American voters with disinformation, CNN reported, citing six sources familiar with the matter.
summary: The United States plans to accuse Russia on Wednesday of a campaign to influence the 2024 elections using online platforms to target American voters with disinformation, CNN reported, citing six sources familiar with the matter.

title: In Pics: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's Visit To Brunei
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi went to Brunei on a state visit on Tuesday, marking the first-ever bilateral trip by an Indian prime minister to the southeast Asian nation.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi went to Brunei on a state visit on Tuesday, marking the first-ever bilateral trip by an Indian prime minister to the southeast Asian nation.

title: New Zealand Hikes Tourist Tax By 200% To Support Economy, Biodiversity
content: New Zealand will significantly raise its International Visitor Conservation and Tourism Levy from NZ$35 to NZ$100 starting October 1st, aiming to boost economic growth and ensure tourists contribute to public services and conservation efforts.
summary: New Zealand will significantly raise its International Visitor Conservation and Tourism Levy from NZ$35 to NZ$100 starting October 1st, aiming to boost economic growth and ensure tourists contribute to public services and conservation efforts.

title: Zelensky Removes Foreign Minister, Face Of Ukraine War Diplomacy, In Rejig
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Wednesday his government needed "new energy" during a major reshuffle that saw the foreign minister and several others hand in their resignation.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Wednesday his government needed "new energy" during a major reshuffle that saw the foreign minister and several others hand in their resignation.

title: Marketing Firm Admits To Listening To Your Phone Conversations: Report
content: A recent report reveals that a major marketing firm with clients including Facebook and Google, has admitted to using its "Active Listening" software to monitor smartphone conversations for targeted advertising.

title: All About iPhone 16 Series Set To Launch On September 9
content: Apple is set to release its highly anticipated iPhone 16 series at the upcoming "It's Glowtime" event on September 9. Alongside the new iPhones, the tech behemoth will also likely introduce the Watch Series 10 and a few accessories.

title: Greta Thunberg Arrested At Gaza War Protest At Copenhagen University
content: Environmental activist Greta Thunberg has been arrested today at a protest against the Gaza war in Denmark, a spokesperson for the student group organising the demonstration said.
summary: Environmental activist Greta Thunberg has been arrested today at a protest against the Gaza war in Denmark, a spokesperson for the student group organising the demonstration said.

title: Deaths In UK Tower Fire, Which Killed 72, Were "All Avoidable", Finds Probe
content: The UK's Grenfell Tower fire disaster that killed 72 people was the result of "decades of failure" by government and construction industry bodies and the "systematic dishonesty" of building material firms, a damning final report said on Wednesday.
summary: The UK's Grenfell Tower fire disaster that killed 72 people was the result of "decades of failure" by government and construction industry bodies and the "systematic dishonesty" of building material firms, a damning final report said on Wednesday.

title: Russia's 9M370 Burevestnik 'Invincible' Nuke: 5 Facts On 'Flying Chernobyl'
content: US researchers recently located the deployment site of Russia's new nuclear-powered, nuclear-armed cruise missile, the 9M370 Burevestnik. Nicknamed "flying Chernobyl," the missile has been touted by President Putin as "invincible."

title: Brave Man Saves 5-Year-Old Son From Mountain Lion Attack In US
content: An American family's Labor Day picnic at Malibu Creek State Park turned into a terrifying ordeal when a mountain lion attacked their 5-year-old son. The father bravely fought off the predator, saving the child.
summary: An American family's Labor Day picnic at Malibu Creek State Park turned into a terrifying ordeal when a mountain lion attacked their 5-year-old son. The father bravely fought off the predator, saving the child.

title: New Research Shows Mobile Phones Are Not Linked To Brain Cancer
content: A systematic review into the potential health effects from radio wave exposure has shown mobile phones are not linked to brain cancer. The review was commissioned by the World Health Organization and is published today.
summary: A systematic review into the potential health effects from radio wave exposure has shown mobile phones are not linked to brain cancer. The review was commissioned by the World Health Organization and is published today.

title: Opinion: Rafi Songs To Roti, Brunei's Deep Cultural Connect With India

title: PM Modi In Singapore To Enhance Strategic Ties. Know All About His Visit
content: PM Modi has arrived in Singapore for his official two-day visit to further strengthen bilateral ties between the two nations. The prime minister's visit to Singapore comes after a historic visit to Brunei as part of New Delhi's 'Act East' policy.
summary: PM Modi has arrived in Singapore for his official two-day visit to further strengthen bilateral ties between the two nations. The prime minister's visit to Singapore comes after a historic visit to Brunei as part of New Delhi's 'Act East' policy.
